thread.title: June Cassidy
thread.title_full: Voltaire Diamonds reviewed by June Cassidy

author: June Cassidy
title: June Cassidy
text: From the moment I made contact with Voltaire diamonds to the day I picked up the ring I designed with the help of Rachel at Voltaire the service , profesionalism and attention to detail was faultless. My girlfriend is thrilled with her engagement ring as am i. It is absolutely stunning and more beautiful and sparkly then we imagined possible. Thank you Voltaire Diamonds!!
